krpano.title: Virtual Tour
krpano.action: if(startscene === null OR !scene[get(startscene)], copy(startscene,scene[0].name); ); loadscene(get(startscene), null, MERGE); if(startactions !== null, startactions() ); landscape-mobile();
if(startscene === null OR !scene[get(startscene)], copy(startscene,scene[0].name); ); loadscene(get(startscene), null, MERGE); if(startactions !== null, startactions() );

for(set(i,0), i LT hotspot.count, inc(i), getlooktodistance(d, hotspot[get(i)].ath, hotspot[get(i)].atv); if(d LT 8, highlight_hotspot(get(i), get(hotspot[get(i)].name)); , background_hotspot(get(i), get(hotspot[get(i)].name)); ); );
if(hotspot[%1].ishighlighted != true, set(activehotspot,%2); set(hotspot[%1].ishighlighted, true); callwith(hotspot[%2], onover); callwith(plugin[%2], onover); set(plugin[%2].hovering, true); );
if(hotspot[%1].ishighlighted, set(hotspot[%1].ishighlighted, false); callwith(hotspot[%2], onout); callwith(plugin[%2], onout); set(plugin[%2].hovering, false); set(activehotspot,null); );
for(set(i,0), i LT hotspot.count, inc(i), set(hotspot[get(i)].visible,false); );

for(set(i,0), i LT hotspot.count, inc(i), copy(hs,hotspot[get(i)]); if(hs.name != 'vr_cursor' AND hs.name != 'skin_webvr_prev_scene' AND hs.name != 'skin_webvr_next_scene', set(hotspot[get(i)].visible,true); ); );

removelayer(%1); addlayer(%1); set(layer[%1].parent, %2); set(layer[%1].align, lefttop); set(layer[%1].width, 100%); set(layer[%1].height, 100%); if(device.html5, txtadd(iframecode, '[iframe id="krpano_iframe_',%1,'" width="100%" height="100%" src="',%3,'" frameborder="0" allow-same-origin allowfullscreen][/iframe]'); copy(layer[%1].html, iframecode); set(layer[%1].padding, 0); set(layer[%1].url, 'textfield.swf'); set(layer[%1].interactivecontent, true); set(layer[%1].onloaded, iframe_resize(%1); ); set(layer[child].visible, true); set(layer[parent-hintergrund].visible, true); sidebar_verstecken(); , showlog(); trace(error,'Iframe is not working in flash mode!'); );

style.name: close-lightbox-layer-style
style.onclick: set(layer[child].visible, false); set(layer[parent-hintergrund].visible, false); tween(layer[lightbox-layer].scale, 0); sidebar_zeigen();
